login-form.title: Login to MedFlow
login-form.content: Enter your email and password. Use OAuth for quick social login.

dashboard.title: Your Dashboard
dashboard.content: View key metrics, quick actions, and recent activity at a glance.

appointment-form.title: Schedule Appointment
appointment-form.content: Select patient, provider, date, and time. System prevents double-booking.

waitlist-tab.title: Waitlist Management
waitlist-tab.content: Manage patient waitlist with status tracking and auto-notifications.

patient-form.title: Patient Registration
patient-form.content: Enter patient demographics, insurance, and enable portal access.

eprescribe-modal.title: ePrescribe Workflow
eprescribe-modal.content: Step-by-step prescription creation with drug interaction checking. Edit mode prefills medication name.

diagnosis-form.title: Diagnosis Entry
diagnosis-form.content: Search ICD codes and link prescriptions for better documentation.

lab-order-form.title: Lab Order Creation
lab-order-form.content: Use CPT multiselect to order multiple tests. Support for one-time, recurring, and future orders.

pharmacy-form.title: Pharmacy Management
pharmacy-form.content: Use toggle switches for service features like 24-hour, e-prescribe, delivery.

lab-directory.title: Laboratory Directory
lab-directory.content: Manage lab facilities with electronic ordering and integration settings.

admin.title: Welcome to MedFlow!
admin.content: This is your central dashboard. View key metrics and quick actions here.

admin.title: Navigation Menu
admin.content: Access all modules from this sidebar. Your role determines what you can see.

admin.title: Your Profile
admin.content: Manage your profile, switch roles, and access settings here.

admin.title: Need Help?
admin.content: Click here anytime to access help, documentation, and the AI assistant.

doctor.title: Welcome, Doctor!
doctor.content: Your dashboard shows today's appointments and pending tasks.

doctor.title: Appointments
doctor.content: Manage your schedule here. View calendar, list, or waitlist.

doctor.title: Patient Records
doctor.content: Access complete patient medical history and EHR.

doctor.title: Help & Support
doctor.content: Get contextual help and use the AI assistant for quick answers.
